item.title: Leaked Valve data reveals it's smaller than most AAA developers, let alone publishers – and The Witcher 4 seemingly has 5x more staff than the entirety of Steam - Gamesradar
item.description:
1. Leaked Valve data reveals it's smaller than most AAA developers, let alone publishers – and The Witcher 4 seemingly has 5x more staff than the entirety of Steam  Gamesradar
  2. Here’s how much Valve pays its staff — and how few people it employs  The Verge
  3. Court documents show that not only is Valve a fraction the size of companies like EA or Ubisoft, it's smaller than a lot of triple-A developers  PC Gamer
  4. Court papers expose how much Valve pays its employees, and how many it has  ReadWrite
  5. Valve Is Not as Giant in Terms of Employees as You Might Think, Court Documents Reveal  80.lv
